website_summaries.verdict: The Pentax 03 Fish-Eye captures the world in a unique perspective, but it's not a lens you'll use all the time.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Pint-Sized Lens
customer_reviews.text: A fun fisheye for a low price. Sharper than expected for the cost, provided that one very carefully focuses using the magnified manual focus view. The f/5.6 fixed aperture is fine outdoors and even usable indoors in low light thanks to the excellent Pentax Q in-body image stabilization and decent higher ISO performance. This lens is cheap, fun and surprisingly capable. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Warnecke

customer_reviews.title: Great little lens for the price. Use focus-peaking and you'll be set.
customer_reviews.text: I've found that this is a pretty good little lens if you turn on the focus-peaking feature. I'll let other reviewers go into the technical details, but in my few weeks with this little lens I find that it takes great ultra-wide images and is pretty easy to focus. Just as with most fish-eye lenses, though, you gotta be careful not to scratch the front lens element. I'm loving my little Pentax Q -- it's so easy to travel with!
customer_reviews.author: F. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Terrific glass at a fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with some trepidation -- I'm not a giant fan of the whole toy lens thing -- and really have been shocked at the quality. To give you a point of reference, my favorite 35mm lens is still the spectacular Pentax 135 1.8 ED; these days it lives on my K20d. On the Q, I have the 01 Prime, 02 short zoom and 06 long zoom, along with the 03 Fisheye. The latter, while slow, is sharp and glorious. And addictive. Bought a second for my daughter; otherwise, I'd never have gotten mine back...
customer_reviews.author: Chris Feola

customer_reviews.title: fun lens!!
customer_reviews.text: i have never used a fisheye but this is a fun little lens...wish i could autoficus but knew that before i bought it...the infinity on the focus is off so don't plan on focusing for long distance and just leaving it wide open..none of these issues i see as negatives..price is good and it's a nice little lens...may want to get one of the extra small neoprene cases they sell here because it is nice to have the extra protection
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Biggest field of view in smallest sized lens and camera. It's a hoot.
customer_reviews.text: Great little lens. Delivers biggest scope in smallest package out there. Be aware most useful infinity is achieved a notch or two prior to the last tab on the lens. I leave it there most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Seither

customer_reviews.title: Unique and Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great little lens to have in the bottom of your Pentax Q bag. Read the forums to understand how to use this correctly.
customer_reviews.author: SCC

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's fun, and I'm keeping it.. Sharp it is not. Price per performance ratio? good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about this lens. I have no use for the "toy" lenses for the Q, but this is a must have for it. Fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bess

customer_reviews.title: Pocket sized Fish Eye lens
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for a few pics but it works very well. I plan on bringing it along for more creative photos outdoors this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with!
customer_reviews.text: Though I found it cheaper somewhere, but still won't regret buying it. Really fun to play with since it gave an interesting angle to view the world!
customer_reviews.author: shere

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Been playing with this lens for about a month now and I did not expect it to be so much fun! This is what the Q experience is meant to be! Small, Light and FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Felix Tan

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the petite size and effect it gives off. It's light but strangely durable enough to withstand it rubbing against my chest as it swayed while I walked. Definitely a good must have fun lens for Q owners.
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: fun lens, but it is still a toy...a neat toy.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great BUT
customer_reviews.text: Pictures come out WOW, BUT: -It doesn't work with autofocus, which means you will ruin some pictures... -I cannot figure out if I can manually set the exposure. I know, of course, you can with this camera. But I can't get it to work with this lens. If anyone else has fixed this issue please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Waliki

customer_reviews.title: Great Lens for Pentax Q!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she loves this lens. This is her favorite. High quality Pentax lens for the Pentax Q. Very fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: A really cute lens to have for your pentax q camera. I can't express the result it has, it's truly great. Plus there's no shutter sound for this lens
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Wan

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but lacking sharpness
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this lens for about 3 months now, and while it's easy to get over the lack of autofocus due to the great depth of field, the lack of sharpness has been pretty disappointing. I realize that it's unreasonable to expect better optics in this form factor at this price point, but I was really expecting better. Hopefully the superwide prime that is slated to come out late 2013/early 2014 is better.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Frenz

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Love the 03 lens! Always provides some interesting perspective and is a great for macro and other close-ups, as well as landscapes. Auto-focus would have been nice, but for the price, I'm totally satisfied,
customer_reviews.author: GrizzlyG

product_meta.title: Pentax 03 Fish-Eye Lens for Pentax Q
feature_bullets: Focal length equivalent to 17.5mm in the 35mm format
Offers 160 degree angle of view with fisheye distortion that increases toward the edge of the frame.
Pan focus effect is designed to capture all elements in the image frame in sharp focus

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars42 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
